creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical text and illustration of a hardwood floor printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers and hand illuminated in colored pencils; 4 pp.
inscription: Front cover, black ink marker: to fly. / hppray for / your new / book! / Sam. (drawing of glasses)
medium: Offset lithogrpahy, colored pencil; bound volume
title: The Floor
